exercises.name: Push Up
exercises.description: Push-ups are a classic bodyweight exercise that strengthen the chest, shoulders, and triceps while engaging the core. They improve upper body stability, posture, and overall endurance.
steps: Start in a high plank position with hands placed slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Lower your body slowly until your chest nearly touches the floor.
Pause for a second at the bottom.
Push through your palms to return to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: Bench press is a compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps. It helps build upper body strength and muscle mass.
steps: Lie on a flat bench with feet firmly on the floor.
Grip the barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Lower the bar slowly to touch your mid-chest.
Pause for a second.
Push the bar back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

exercises.name: Squat
exercises.description: Squats are a fundamental lower body exercise that strengthen the quadriceps, glutes, hamstrings, and core. They also improve balance and mobility.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly pointing outwards.
Engage your core and keep your chest up.
Lower your hips back and down as if sitting in a chair until thighs are parallel to the floor.
Push through your heels to return to the standing position.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Lunges strengthen the quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings while improving balance and coordination.
steps: Stand upright with feet together.
Step forward with one leg and lower your hips until both knees are at 90-degree angles.
Ensure the front knee stays above the ankle and does not pass the toes.
Push back through the front heel to return to starting position.
Alternate legs and repeat for desired reps.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: Deadlifts strengthen the posterior chain, including the lower back, glutes, and hamstrings. They also improve core stability and posture.
steps: Stand with feet hip-width apart with the barbell on the floor in front of you.
Bend at the hips and knees to grip the bar with hands shoulder-width apart.
Keep your back straight and chest up as you lift the bar by extending hips and knees.
Stand fully upright while holding the bar close to your body.
Lower the bar slowly back to the floor while maintaining a straight back.
Repeat for desired reps.

exercises.name: Shoulder Press
exercises.description: The shoulder press targets the deltoids and helps build shoulder strength and stability.
steps: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height with palms facing forward.
Engage your core and keep your back straight.
Press the dumbbells upward until your arms are fully extended overhead.
Pause briefly at the top.
Lower the weights back to shoulder height slowly.
Repeat for desired reps.

exercises.name: Bicep Curl
exercises.description: Bicep curls isolate and strengthen the biceps muscles, improving arm strength and appearance.
steps: Stand upright with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Keep elbows close to your torso.
Curl the weights upward while contracting the biceps.
Pause at the top of the movement.
Slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Repeat for desired reps.

exercises.name: Tricep Dip
exercises.description: Tricep dips target the triceps using bodyweight, while also engaging the chest and shoulders.
steps: Sit on a bench or chair and place your hands next to your hips.
Slide your hips forward off the bench, supporting your weight with your hands.
Lower your body until elbows reach 90 degrees.
Push back up to the starting position.
Repeat for desired reps.
